title: Update: Before You Get Excited About Potentially Winning The Lottery...Listen To This!
description:
If you've been paying attention to the lottery then you know about the record-breaking Mega Millions pot of $810 million. No one won the drawing, so it means that the pot will increase to a billion!
That's life-changing money that a lot of people would be excited to win. However, with money comes problems. And today, Kristin is sharing a list of horror stories from lottery winners.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
